about_the_game:
Please enjoy our FREE mini prelude chapter!



Inspired by love of classic RPGs like the Legend of Zelda and Secret of Mana.

Bloom: Memories is a refreshing new take on the action adventure / RPG. Where killing is optional and creatures act on realistic desires. ((A spider attacks because it's hungry, not because it's evil, so maybe feed it instead of running straight into a fight.))

Embark on an epic adventure through the forests, deserts, mountains, lakes, and dungeons as you find your place in the world and try to survive a brewing war.



Features:

  • Creatures that use hearing, smelling, vision AND emotions to sense the world!
  • Varied gameplay including stealth and other peaceful options
  • Uncover imaginative plants and abilities
  • Meet strange creatures and inhabitants of the forest and beyond.
  • Find and tame over a dozen different pets to keep you company
  • A large world spanning deserts, forests, mountains, lakes, and a host of dungeons!
  • And much more!!
